article_text: Surprise: Kansas has actually lost jobs over the last six months, making it one of only five states in the nation to suffer that fate. The disturbing news further undermines Gov. Sam Brownback’s contention that the deep income tax cuts he and the Legislature approved in 2012 would act like a job magnet for Kansas.

article_metadata.news-keywords: brownback, governor, jobs, kansas, opinion, missouri, tax cuts
article_metadata.title: Stunning job losses in Kansas undermine Brownback’s re-election plan | The Kansas City Star
